title: Symmetric Cryptography Asymmetric CryptographySymmetric
extract: Asymmetrical encryption is also known as public key cryptography, which is a relatively new method, compared to symmetric encryption. Asymmetric encryption uses two keys to encrypt a plain text. ... Security of the public key is not required because it is publicly available and can be passed over the internet.Dec 31, 2015
extract_html: Asymmetrical encryption is also known as public key cryptography, which is a relatively new method, compared to symmetric encryption. Asymmetric encryption uses two keys to encrypt a plain text. ... Security of the public key is not required because it is publicly available and can be passed over the internet.Dec 31, 2015
